statements: DELETE FROM customer_purchases WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND product_name = 'Shoes';
DELETE FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 500 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_purchases WHERE customer_id = 123 AND purchase_date = '2022-01-15'
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 100 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE birthdate < '1990-01-01' AND customer_name LIKE 'A%';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100)
DELETE FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 100 AND product_id = 200;
DELETE FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500.00;
